title: Dots Watch Face
summary: Dots Watch Face, contemporary watch face. Elegant bauhaus design, for Wear

Montréal, QC

description: Dots Watch Face for Android Wear, a contemporary watch face design. Simple and elegant black and white dots recall the Bauhaus era of graphic design.---✭ Optimized for both Android Wear circular and square watches.✭ Low battery consumption with monochrome palette.✭ Best Simple Design Watch Face for your Android Wear device.Support for Android Wear 1 and Android Wear 2 watches.Thanks to @uxmomo for the poster design.
descriptionHTML:
Dots Watch Face for Android Wear, a contemporary watch face design. Simple and elegant black and white dots recall the Bauhaus era of graphic design.
---
✭ Optimized for both Android Wear circular and square watches.
✭ Low battery consumption with monochrome palette.
✭ Best Simple Design Watch Face for your Android Wear device.

Support for Android Wear 1 and Android Wear 2 watches.

Thanks to @uxmomo for the poster design.
comments: Nice, clean design--easy to read Very nice watch face design. It's easy to read since every minute has its own circle and has a pretty cool retro style.  A couple of suggestions/feature requests: -ability to change the color scheme -a toggle to allow a digital clock in the center
